StrengthMultiplyer: Multiplies the strength of any active motors. (can blend from 0-1 for example)

methods.name: ApplyPhysicalAnimationProfileBelow
ApplyPhysicalAnimationSettings
methods.doc: Applies the physical animation settings to the body given.

methods.name: ApplyPhysicalAnimationSettingsBelow
methods.doc: Applies the physical animation settings to the body given and all bodies below.

methods.name: GetBodyTargetTransform
methods.doc: Returns the target transform for the given body. If physical animation component is not controlling this body, returns its current transform.

methods.name: SetSkeletalMeshComponent
methods.doc: Sets the skeletal mesh we are driving through physical animation. Will erase any existing physical animation data.

methods.name: SetStrengthMultiplyer
methods.doc: Updates strength multiplyer and any active motors
